alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Basin; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 4:56PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds will impact portions of central Duchesne County through 530 PM MDT... At 455 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds over Duchesne, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Duchesne, Starvation Reservoir, Altamont, Upalco, Mountain Home, Arcadia, Talmage, Altonah, Cedarview, Utahn, Bridgeland and Neola. This includes the following highways... US Route 40 between mile markers 74 and 103. Utah Route 35 between mile markers 47 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs; Western Uinta Basin; Western Uinta Mountains
